document_data.name: Yeast
document_data.mainbody: '''Yeast''' was a species of microscopic [[fungus]] that received wide use in [[alcohol]]-making
document_data.Description: Yeast had a distinct smell often associated with baking. It flourished in warm areas but high temperature killed yeast.
document_data.Locations: The [[Larawkan Lane]] in [[Selgaunt]] had a constant strong aroma of yeast and freshly baked bread. That pleasant aroma also was encountered in the City of Splendors, [[Waterdeep]]. In the [[Ten Towns]] of [[Icewind Dale]], yeast was a trade commodity often carried by merchants alongside [[flour]] and [[spice]]s.
